code: import{useState,useEffect}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function CodeWarsScores(_ref){let{nameCW}=_ref;const[rankName,setRankName]=useState(null);const[score,setScore]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{const fetchData=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.get('https://www.codewars.com/api/v1/users/Fenriz1349');const languageData=response.data.ranks.languages[nameCW.toLowerCase()];if(languageData){setRankName(languageData.name);setScore(languageData.score);}else{console.error("Langage \"".concat(nameCW,"\" non trouv\xE9 dans la r\xE9ponse de l'API."));}}catch(error){console.error('Erreur lors de la récupération du score de CodeWars : ',error);}};fetchData();},[nameCW]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:rankName&&score&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Rang : ",rankName,", ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:score})," points"]})});};export default CodeWarsScores;
